message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,000 is too low for me. Could you do $13,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with $13,000. How about we meet at $11,500? I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $11,500.  My final offer is $12,500. This is a very fair price considering the value you'll be getting.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit above $12,500. Can you do $12,000 and we'll call it a deal?
